doc:
John McIntire https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_McIntire 0 John Herrick McIntire (June 27, 1907 – January 30, 1991) was an American character actor who appeared in 65 theatrical films and many more television series. McIntire is best known for having replaced Ward Bond, upon Bond's sudden death in November 1960, as the star of NBC's Wagon Train. He played Christopher Hale, the leader of the wagon train (and successor to Bond's character, Seth Adams) from early 1961 to the series' end in 1965. He also replaced Charles Bickford, upon Bickford's death in 1967, as ranch owner Clay Grainger (brother of Bickford's character) on NBC's The Virginian for four seasons. John_Herrick_McIntire ( June_27_,_1907 – January_30_,_1991 ) was an_American_character_actor who appeared in 65_theatrical_films and many_more_television_series . McIntire is_best_known for having_replaced Ward_Bond , upon Bond 's_sudden_death in November_1960 , as the_star of NBC 's_Wagon_Train . He played Christopher_Hale , the_leader of the_wagon_train_(_and_successor to Bond 's_character , Seth_Adams_) from early_1961 to the_series '_end in 1965 . He also replaced Charles_Bickford , upon Bickford 's_death in 1967 , as ranch_owner_Clay_Grainger_(_brother of Bickford 's_character_) on NBC 's_The_Virginian for four_seasons .
